title.rendered: The Key Visual for FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul!

content.rendered:
FOSS4G-Asia 2023 will be held in the city of ‘Seoul,’ where the future coexists with tradition.

Seoul is a place where Korea’s spatial arrangement can be encountered simultaneously in traditional and modern expressions.

We are pleased to unveil the Key Visual for FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul!

This theme harmoniously blends Korean traditional motifs with diverse geographical landscapes. It’s an opportunity to immerse yourself in Korea’s outstanding geospatial technology. We highly value your keen interest.

Thank you!

☞ Date : November 28th to December 2nd, 2023

☞ Venue : Seoul Hall of Urbanism & Architecture, Korea

☞ Organized by : Seoul Metropolitan Government, Korean Society of Geospatial Information Science, Open Source Geospatial Foundation
